p:
In addition to antiviral property, baricitinib has been suggested as an approach for a cytokine storm syndrome, which features hypercytokinemia and multi-organ failure. Elevated ferritin and IL-6 in COVID-19 cases were predictive of a high mortality rate according to a China retrospective study.
17 Baricitinib inhibits cytokines including IL-2, IL-6, IL-10, interferon gamma (IFN-Î³), and granulocyte-colony-stimulating factor (G-CSF)
13, 18 and may bring the benefit of immune reconstruction which could be used in rapidly progressive diseases.
